message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to us, I propose a price of $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.  Let me know what you think.

I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value of the product, I'd like to counter your offer with a price of $105. This still leaves a bit of room for negotiation while ensuring we get a fair return for our product.
Alice,  $105 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $95. This is my final offer.
Considering your latest offer, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose a price of $100 for the product. This brings the cost closer to your budget while still allowing us to cover our costs.
